title: Burke Mountain Middle/Secondary School
summary: Burke Mountain Middle/Secondary School is a new school being built in Coquitlam, British Columbia. It will have space for 1,000 students in Grades 6 to 12, along with a neighborhood learning center and a community park. The provincial government is contributing $135 million, and the Coquitlam School District is adding $25 million to fund the project. Construction started in 2024, and the school is expected to be finished by September 2026.
